post.body: Sorry Paykan, but I told you this was coming.
Good times :)
I'm only in your life because you chose for me to still be. Ignore me and I dissapear.
Yes Harvey, Josh did call me MANY times while Amanda was at work.
No, I just RT what you say because people find it humorous.
If you stop posting things about people who you don't want in your life anyway then I wouldn't have anything to RT.
He didn't, but we gave many hugs :)
Hello! :)
LMAO Paykan. Great wording.
I love you too, splooge in hand and all :P
The Curious Case of Benjamin Button. It waa good, but LONG
Hell no! I've already had one concussion this year! That's not something that is the more the merrier!!!
LOL, if he does I hope he doesn't do it full force like Angel does!!!
http://twitpic.com/wsgt - @chaoticlove08 Don't hate me because your boyfriend called me.
LMAO. Thank you @chaoticlove08 @harveyfrank and @paykan for making Retweet Day an amazing one!
RT @HarveyFrank: today is a new holiday it's called retweet day,lol
RT @ChaoticLove08 @ rachelbabble IDK why you keep Rt my shit but stop it it is Just annoying as HELL...GROW up and Get a GRIP its OVER let i
everyone: name your tweetdeck columns! mine are: all tweets, replies, direct messages, and local search
Yay! @jerbear83 is on his way over :)
good morning twits!
